cons: Avoid use in pregnancy as it may cause adverse effects.
Borage products containing hepatotoxic pyrrolizidine alkaloids (PA) might make liver disease worse.
Borage might increase the risk of bleeding during and after surgery. Stop taking borage at least 2 weeks before a scheduled surgery.
description:
This herb contains phytonutrients, minerals, and vitamins that are essential for optimum health and wellness.
Borage herb contains essential fatty acid γ -linolenic acid (GLA), which plays a vital role in the restoration of joint health, immunity, healthy skin and mucosa.
Fresh borage herb has high levels of vitamin C (ascorbic acid), which is one of the powerful natural anti-oxidant.
It helps to remove harmful free radicals from the body.
It rich in vitamin-A and carotenes are protects from lung and oral cavity cancers.
